data.system_settings: Asus Transformer book T100TA Windows 10 Home 32-bit, x64-based processor
data.actual_result: It freezes and I have to wait a while. Note: It rarely happens with a slow internet, or when you are at the end of the WiFi range
data.expected_result: It shouldn't freeze. It would just run smooth as silk
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an active server - Minimize Discord Canary - Hibernate the pc/laptop/transformer book etc. - Open the app after hibernation (wait for about 5 minutes or more) - (At different times) Come back from other apps. Note: Canary should be minimized
